home.name: Home
home.part1: Some Front-End projects made using HTML, CSS, Javascript, ReactJS and Angular

repository.rpg-apps-angular-desc: A simple RPG companion app with dice roller, game hooks, loot generator, initiative tracker and npc generator for dnd 4th edition
repository.todo-app-desc: A Todo List App. User can add Todo, toggle status and remove Todo. React course by Dev Ed.
repository.pokedex-desc: A Simple Pokedex. You can search Pokemons by name and see their details. Api used: pokeapi
repository.wwe-trivia-rumble-desc: A list with trivia questions related to WWE. You can filter by typing the question on the input box.
repository.tour-of-heroes-desc: Angular Tutorial. List of Super Heroes
repository.lost-judgement-tsx-desc: Material List for the game Lost Judgement
